iwant2tryhardtweaks.midnightconfig.debug: debug messages to stdout because i dont wanna set up logger
iwant2tryhardtweaks.midnightconfig.noBlo: When enabled, particles will not be shown for when blocks break.
When enabled, particles will not be shown for blocks that are breaking.
iwant2tryhardtweaks.midnightconfig.handF: Custom hand Field of View Enabled
The field of view of the player's hand, Separate from the normal field of view.
iwant2tryhardtweaks.midnightconfig.xaero: When enabled, the ETA to the waypoint will be shown when looking at the waypoint.
iwant2tryhardtweaks.midnightconfig.reiEn: When enabled, you can press 2 keys (configurable in game controls) to view the recipe and usages of the block you are looking at.
